sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne te soucie pas de l'opinion des autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't care about what others think.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào bǔ yīxià zhè mén kè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois rattraper ce cours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to make up this class.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请把空调的温度调低一点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ kōngtiáo de wēndù tiáo dī yīdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez baisser un peu la température de la climatisation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn down the air conditioning temperature a bit.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les rues sont très calmes la nuit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The streets are very quiet at night.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette ville est connue pour son industrie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This city is famous for its industry.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ta montre est-elle à l'heure ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is your watch accurate?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéfèi měi nián dōu zài zhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les frais de scolarité augmentent chaque année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Tuition fees increase every year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous nous sommes dit au revoir à l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We said goodbye at the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez coopérer avec notre travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please cooperate with our work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le directeur de l'institut est en réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The director of the institute is in a meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce type d'aliment est riche en nutriments.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This type of food is rich in nutrients.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il représente l'entreprise à la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He represents the company at the meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux entreprises ont décidé de coopérer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two companies decided to cooperate.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我买了两张演唱会的票。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le liǎng zhāng yǎnchànghuì de piào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté deux billets pour le concert.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought two tickets for the concert.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette transaction a été très réussie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This transaction was very successful.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他很自觉地完成了任务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn zìjué de wánchéng le rènwu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a accompli la tâche de manière consciente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He consciously completed the task.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez présenter votre carte d'identité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your ID card.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 白菜是冬天常见的蔬菜。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Báicài shì dōngtiān chángjiàn de shūcài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le chou chinois est un légume courant en hiver.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese cabbage is a common vegetable in winter.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 很多人在观看这场比赛。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn duō rén zài guānkàn zhè chǎng bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Beaucoup de gens regardent ce match.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Many people are watching this match.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chuānzhe yī jiàn báisè chènyī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il porte une chemise blanche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is wearing a white shirt.
